snippet: The State Supreme Court should reject the new law that would disproportionately affect minority, poor and senior citizen voters.
abstract: Editorial urges the Pennsylvania Supreme Court to reject the state's new photo ID law, arguing that it would disproportionately disenfranchise minority, poor and senior voters; notes that the state has offered no evidence of voter identity fraud.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court should reject the new law that would disproportionately affect minority, poor and senior citizen voters.
